Section.Catchline: Organization of legal expense insurance corporations.

Subsection.Text: Any number of corporations or adult natural persons may organize a legal expense insurance corporation under the law of this state relating to corporations generally.
The articles of incorporation shall conform to the requirements applicable to corporations, and, in addition:

Paragraph.Text: The name of the corporation shall indicate that legal services or indemnity for legal expenses is to be provided; and
The purposes of the corporation shall be limited to providing legal services or indemnity for legal expenses and business reasonably related thereto.
